original_title: คุณปู่ซู่ซ่า
overview: Eak is a single old man, a womankind who loves flirting with any woman he sees and dresses according to the style of the woman he is going out with. Mod, his grand daughter from Laos comes to live with him. Because he wants to be alone all the time, he puts Mod in a kindergarten, but once he has a chance to meet Mod’s teacher, he begins to flirt with her by using Mod as a go between. One day he gets injured from helping the teacher’s father from a mugger, so she gets to know him better and has some feelings toward him.
title: Grand Father
